meanings.definition: A pine tree with long needles and large cones.
meanings.sent1: The pinaster stood tall in the forest, its long needles swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I love the fresh scent of pinaster trees in the woods.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squirrel bring a tiny umbrella to the pinaster tree? To stay dry from resin rain!
meanings.sent4: The pinaster's branches reached out like welcoming arms, offering shade to all below.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the silhouette of the pinaster against the sky was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The resinous wood of the pinaster tree.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carved intricate designs into the sturdy pinaster wood.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of pinaster filled the workshop as the carpenter worked on the new table.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got stuck to the pinaster plank with resin, creating a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: The pinaster wood gleamed in the sunlight, a testament to its durability.
meanings.sent5: The cabin was cozy and warm, thanks to the crackling fire fueled by pinaster logs.

meanings.definition: A type of pine tree commonly found in Mediterranean regions.
meanings.sent1: The pinaster's roots spread wide in the sandy soil of the Mediterranean coast.
meanings.sent2: Locals gathered under the shade of the pinaster to escape the scorching sun.
meanings.sent3: Why did the seagull invite the pinaster to the beach party? For some cool Mediterranean vibes!
meanings.sent4: The pinaster swayed gracefully in the coastal breeze, a symbol of resilience.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant blue sea contrasted beautifully with the lush green of the pinaster grove.
